channel.title: Mohammad Jafari Blog
channel.description: Articles on AI, product, and engineering by Mohammad Jafari.

item.title: The AI Hangover
item.description: 2025 was the year of peak AI noise. 2026 will be the year of the hangover. and the return to craftsmanship.

item.title: Delete More Code
item.description: Last month I deleted about 40% of our codebase. Not refactored. Deleted. It was the most productive week I've had all year.

item.title: Always Be Building
item.description: I have 47 ideas in my notes app right now. A social app where you scroll through music instead of photos. An AI persona that actually remembers and evolves. A style engine that tells you what clothes fit your proportions. I used to think I needed to figure out which ones were worth building before I started. I was wrong.

item.title: LLMs in Production: What Nobody Tells You
item.description: I've spent the last few years building LLM features at two companies. First at Nasdaq on an entity research copilot, then at Retellio where I built the entire AI pipeline from scratch. Here's what I wish someone had told me before I started.

item.title: From Calls to Clarity: Shipping Insight Podcasts at Retellio
item.description: How Retellio turns long customer calls into short, insight-rich podcasts delivered where teams work; integrating with Salesforce, HubSpot, Gong, and Zoom.

item.title: The Future of AI in B2B Customer Research
item.description: Reflections on the evolving role of AI in B2B customer research and where it's heading.
